Author: GitHub
Title: From Minecraft to global crisis: the Log4Shell story
Description:
Remember Log4Shell? This short recaps the infamous Log4j vulnerability that shook the digital world, from its discovery via Minecraft to the intense pressure on maintainers like Christian Grobmeier. Learn about the key lessons and how the GitHub Secure Open Source Fund is helping prevent the next crisis.

Watch the full, untold story with Christian: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t74ClffSUW0

#Log4Shell #Log4j #OpenSource
